name: Doorside
description:
You are trapped in a room with one exit. You can either

Quit the game and continue with your normal life
Or
You can walk through the magic door and enter an alternate reality. There is no turning back. Survive as long as possible.

Good luck

This game was originally made in 48 hours for AsylumJam 2016 on GameJolt.

Credits:

Ghastly Panic (Font) – Sinister Fonts
